content.query:
CREATE VIEW [reporting].[dim_address]
	AS 
	SELECT 
	a.Address_ID, a.Address_Line1, a.Address_Line2, a.City, a.State_Province, a.Country_Region, a.Postal_Code, a.Modified_Date,
	ca.Customer_ID, ca.Address_Type
	FROM
	[dbo].[address] a 
	left join CustomerAddress ca on ca.Address_ID = a.Address_ID
